meanings.definition: Smallest in size, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent1: The puppy was the least of all the dogs in the litter.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the least expensive option when shopping.
meanings.sent3: The least cupcake in the box looked sad all alone.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the least among the choir, barely audible.
meanings.sent5: The least star in the sky twinkled faintly.

meanings.definition: To the smallest extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: He least expected to see a shooting star that night.
meanings.sent2: Please try to least disturb the birds while they are nesting.
meanings.sent3: I least want to miss the bus, so I'll be ready early.
meanings.sent4: She least noticed the changes in the painting over time.
meanings.sent5: The teacher least tolerates tardiness in her class.

meanings.sent1: She only had the least of coins in her pocket.
meanings.sent2: The least of the candies was saved for last.
meanings.sent3: The least of the pencils in the jar was the only one sharpened.
meanings.sent4: He was the least of the team, but his contribution was crucial.
meanings.sent5: The least of the seeds grew into the tallest sunflower.
